1.title: Sweet Carolina Cravings

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Host Anthony Anderson travels coast-to-coast, tasting indulgent carnival fare and participating in fun contests in this series, which premieres with a trip to Raleigh, N.C. for the "Got to Be NC Festival". Among the dishes highlighted are redneck egg rolls.

2.title: Ooey-Gooey Golden State

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: A carnival in Sacramento is highlighted by cowboys aplenty, a lesson in milking a cow, and Anthony taking a daring ride. Also: he eats a burger with a "cheese skirt" and a bacon-topped cinnamon roll sundae.

3.title: Deep-Fried Rockies

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Massive beef ribs and a deep-fried root beer float are among Anthony's food finds in Parker, Colorado. Later, he gets down and dirty in a sumo battle.

4.title: Bacon-Wrapped Heartland

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Anthony Anderson eats his way through the heartland at Prairie Fest in Oswego, IL.

5.title: San Diego on a Stick

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Anthony finds a melting pot of treats at the San Diego County Fair, where he ends the day taking part in a bubble gum-blowing contest. Also: he satisfies his hunger with Thai chicken fry bread and a chile relleno cheeseburger.

6.title: Lobster Dogs and So-Cal Sundaes

episode of.title: Carnival Cravings with Anthony Anderson (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The Alameda County Fair in Pleasanton, California, is toured in the Season 1 finale by host Anthony Anderson, who chows down on a burger stuffed with mac and cheese and a lobster dog. Also: he takes ice cream and turns it into a spaghetti-and-meatball sundae.
